fields.headline: College Days
fields.bodyText: Name: Edith Bowman Born: January 15, 1975 Occupation: TV presenter currently fronting C4 breakfast show RI:SE and C4 game show Make My Day. Nicknamed "One-take Bowman" from her time at MTV. Enjoys a hooley on the town with bosom chum, Cat Deeley, and Kylie. College: Fife college, Kirkcaldy Course: Communication HND Attended: 1992-1993 A tutor recalls: "Edith was not easily put off. She was persistent about getting the work placement that everyone was after, on Radio Forth in Edinburgh. They offered her work over the summer and from there things really took off for her."
